title: 5 "Neko Majin Mike"ネコマジンみけ August 2003 Weekly Shōnen Jump2003 #37–38[11]
transformers_text: 5 Neko Maj in Mike August 2003 Weekly Sh nen Jump 2003 37 38 11 Neko Maj in Mike meets his friend Koji ro who has become a teacher Koji ro asks Neko Maj in Mike to sub for him in class but to watch out for bully As a giri Za me Neko Maj in Mike beats As a giri easily then transforms to Koji ro as he leads the class on a field trip and helps Koji ro deal with some shady merchants
